title: Ticket #3381: condor_collector logging to CollectorLog.old
description:
One condor_collector running, servicing queries and handling updates, and, whoops, logging into CollectorLog.old. 

/var/log/condor/CollectorLog -

12/14/12 07:04:22 Now in new log file /var/log/condor/CollectorLog
12/14/12 07:04:22 (Sending 414 ads in response to query)
12/14/12 07:04:22 Query info: matched=414; skipped=36; query_time=0.016227; send_time=0.161746; type=Any; requirements={( ( ( MyType == "Scheduler" ) || ( MyType == "Submitter" ) ) || ( ( MyType == "Machine" ) ) )}; peer=<10.10.10.10:37025>; projection={}

/var/log/condor/CollectorLog.old -

12/14/12 07:04:22 Now in new log file /var/log/condor/CollectorLog
12/14/12 07:04:22 Now in new log file /var/log/condor/CollectorLog
12/14/12 07:04:22 WARNING: Failed to rotate log into file /var/log/condor/CollectorLog.old!
12/14/12 07:04:22 Likely cause is that another Condor process rotated the file at the same time.
12/14/12 07:04:22 Number of Active Workers 2
12/14/12 07:04:22 Number of Active Workers 1
12/14/12 07:04:22 (Sending 1 ads in response to query)
12/14/12 07:04:22 Query info: matched=1; skipped=0; query_time=0.003016; send_time=0.000874; type=Negotiator; requirements={true}; peer=<10.10.10.10:52035>; projection={}
12/14/12 07:04:22 Forwarding ad: type=Machine command=UPDATE_STARTD_AD
12/14/12 07:04:22 Forwarding ad: type=Machine command=UPDATE_STARTD_AD
12/14/12 07:04:22 Got QUERY_STARTD_PVT_ADS
12/14/12 07:04:22 Number of Active Workers 1
12/14/12 07:04:22 Number of Active Workers 0
12/14/12 07:04:22 (Sending 409 ads in response to query)
12/14/12 07:04:22 Query info: matched=409; skipped=0; query_time=0.011654; send_time=0.024144; type=MachinePrivate; requirements={true}; peer=<10.10.10.10:34486>; projection={}
12/14/12 07:04:23 NegotiatorAd  : Inserting ** "< matchmaker.local >"
12/14/12 07:04:24 Got QUERY_SCHEDD_ADS
12/14/12 07:04:24 Number of Active Workers 1
12/14/12 07:04:24 Number of Active Workers 0
12/14/12 07:04:24 (Sending 1 ads in response to query)
12/14/12 07:04:24 Query info: matched=1; skipped=0; query_time=0.001636; send_time=0.000859; type=Scheduler; requirements={true}; peer=<10.10.10.11:43140>; projection={Name TotalIdleJobs TotalRunningJobs TotalHeldJobs RecentJobsAccumRunningTime RecentJobsCompleted RecentJobsAccumTimeToStart RecentJobsStarted JobsAccumRunningTime JobsCompleted JobsAccumTimeToStart JobsStarted RecentJobsSubmitted RecentStatsLifetime RecentJobsStarted RecentStatsLifetime RecentJobsCompleted RecentStatsLifetime}
...

# ls -al /proc/$(pidof condor_collector)/fd
total 0
dr-x------. 2 root   root    0 Dec 14 07:08 .
dr-xr-xr-x. 7 condor condor  0 Dec 13 12:09 ..
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 0 -> /dev/null
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 1 -> /dev/null
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 10 -> socket:[2460543214]
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 11 -> /var/log/condor/aviary_locator.log
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 12 -> socket:[2460543215]
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 13 -> anon_inode:[eventpoll]
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 14 -> socket:[2460543108]
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 15 -> socket:[2460543109]
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 16 -> socket:[2460543217]
l-wx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 17 -> /var/log/condor/CollectorLog.old
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 2 -> /dev/null
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 3 -> socket:[2698681730]
lr-x------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 4 -> pipe:[2460543159]
l-wx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 5 -> pipe:[2460543159]
lr-x------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 6 -> pipe:[2460543201]
l-wx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 7 -> pipe:[2460543201]
lr-x------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 8 -> /dev/urandom
lrwx------. 1 root   root   64 Dec 14 07:08 9 -> socket:[2460543213]

The query worker rotated the log, confusing its parent.
creator: matt
